channel.title: Couple source problems please help
channel.description:
Ok i have a couple of problems that i need help with.
1. My ice barrage can freeze other people but not npc's and how can i make it attack npc's to.
2. I barraged a charcter on my server but it took like 2 minutes fort them to unfreeze so i killd them and they died and they still couldnt move untill ike 30 secs later how can i make my barage freeze time shorter
3.[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/ak7i93.jpg[/img] someone please tell me how to delete this?
4. I cannot port forward i went to portforward.com and i followed all steps and i added an exception to my firewall and went to canyouseeme.org and it said my port ws closed and reason: connection timed out. So i downlaoded utorrent tried again and my port was still closed help? ( i have teamveiwer)
5. Also when i made a pure on my server and tried to equip dragon claws but it said i need 60 defence it is supposed to be 60 attack hwo do i change it? please help me.

item.title: Couple source problems please help
item.dc:creator: @underdrive underdrive
item.description:
@underdrive wrote:

@ wanttobecoders
i did what you said and compiled and it showed me this…
Wearing.java:134: illegal start of expression
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“sword”)
^
Wearing.java:143: not a statement
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“halberd”)) {
^
Wearing.java:143: ‘;’ expected
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“halberd”)) {
^
Wearing.java:145: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Ahrims”) || ItemName.startsWith
(“Karil”) || ItemName.startsWith(“Torag”) || ItemName.startsWith(“Verac”) || Ite
mName.startsWith(“Guthans”) || ItemName.endsWith(“Dharok”)) {
^
4 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

[quote=“Sanskrit, post:2, topic:368134”]You do realize that you cannot rep without having at least 15 yourself?
Anyways, use this to port forward. It opens whatever port for you and has a port checker.

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

Yes i understand that and i downlaoded it but what do i do with it.

[quote=“I am beast, post:4, topic:368134”][quote]1. would this affect my server from getting online it says this when i run my run.bat
Voule Auto restart
Could not find process: java
Restarting server
Online.[/quote]

No this does not affect the server, it just means that when you double click on “run.bat” it also trying to run the “voule auto restarter”. If you post the snippet inside your “run.bat” I can tell you what to take out, but right now I have already taken them out.

                                                     OR

Go to “voule.bat” --> “Edit” --> Change the Java version to yours --> Save then double click “run.bat”[/quote]

In the voule.bat it says

@echo off
cls
echo Voule Auto restart
tskill java /a
echo Restarting server
title Smitedscape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
cls

Read full topic

item.title: Couple source problems please help
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

1. would this affect my server from getting online it says this when i run my run.bat Voule Auto restart Could not find process: java Restarting server Online.

No this does not affect the server, it just means that when you double click on “run.bat” it also trying to run the “voule auto restarter”. If you post the snippet inside your “run.bat” I can tell you what to take out, but right now I have already taken them out.

                                                     OR

Go to “voule.bat” --> “Edit” --> Change the Java version to yours --> Save then double click “run.bat”

Read full topic

item.title: Couple source problems please help
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

For the problem 7. go to wearing.java search

public int GetCLDefence

scroll down until you see dragon claw ID or name and delete all the code

exemple:

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel defender")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black defender")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril defender")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant defender")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune defender")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune sq shield")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon claw")) { return 60; }

else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon claw")) { return 60; }

the 60 mean the level of defence you need to wear this item so if u want to fix it gunna be look like that

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel defender")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black defender")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril defender")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant defender")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune defender")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune sq shield")) { return 40; }

Read full topic

Anyways, use this to port forward. It opens whatever port for you and has a port checker.
